page.title: 07 Laboratory Glassware
page.content: Bilbate Ltd are specialists in disposable laboratory glassware.The drawing of capillary tubing is their best thing.First a piece of glass tubing which is about five feet long is put through a heated muffle.Then (when properly heated)it is drawn by a set of rollers. By this time that piece of glass(when finished and cut to a length of three inches) has made about twelve hundred tubes.The tubes are cut up on a specially made board which has an industrial diamond fixed in it. Sometimes the tubes have to have a coloured band put round them.This is done by machine. There is a wheel fixed on a motor.The wheel has small grooves to put the tubes in.There is a pen fixed a certain distance away from the wheel so when the tubes are passed under the pen they are marked.
